segments.text: I see the water trickling down the cabinet doors like an unforgiving stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems so reckless, yet the woman continues drying the plate without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could she be so oblivious? It's infuriating to think about.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I glimpse the cookies in the jar, an irresistible temptation for the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks they are taking make my heart race.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girlâ€™s posture reveals her anticipation, yet it could lead to disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish she'd be more aware of the chaos brewing just a few feet away.
segments.speaker: PAR
